page.title: 12 A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TARA
page.content: Work continues till 12.25pm when we have lunch.This is usually a meat dish with vegetables such as salad, potatoes, carrots or peas, followed by a pudding of jelly or sponge cake or ice cream. At 1.10pm lessons resume until 2.35pm when we have a 10 minute break,then we have lessons till 4.00pm when the day girls go home. My mother then collects me from school.When I arrive home I usually have a small snack of biscuits and a drink then I go outside for a cycle run or watch television until 6pm when I do my study.Then at 7pm I have my supper which is usually a fish or meat dish with vegetables such as potatoes, salad or cabbage.Then I go and play with my hamster,read or watch television till 9pm when I have a bath and go to bed.
